sentences.en: Got manic model disease, leave mental disease not far?
sentences.cn: 得了狂躁型抑郁症, 是不是离精神病不远了?

sentences.en: He seemed to have an almost manic energy.
sentences.cn: 他似乎有一股近乎疯狂的劲头。

sentences.en: He was manic and it was best to let him be.
sentences.cn: 他那样狂躁,只好让他自便了.

sentences.en: Her mother is a manic depressive.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲是一名狂躁抑郁症患者。

sentences.en: Manic brushing will only cause frizz.
sentences.cn: 胡乱梳头只会使头发鬈得厉害。

sentences.en: Manic Monday : Dow roars back from worst week ever.
sentences.cn: 狂躁星期一:道指从历史上最坏的一周狂涨.

sentences.en: Market is depressed and buy when he is manic.
sentences.cn: 当市场先生疯狂时,大多数人想买.

sentences.en: She told them that her daughter-in-law was manic-depressive.
sentences.cn: 她告诉他们，她的儿媳是狂躁抑郁症患者。

sentences.en: The mood is for the moment manic.
sentences.cn: 这种情绪目前是狂热的.

sentences.en: Things are manic in the office at the moment.
sentences.cn: 这会儿办公室里一片忙乱。

sentences.en: This is not for those with manic depression or bi - polar disorder.
sentences.cn: 这不适合狂躁消沉或bi极混乱的那些人.

sentences.en: Tonight he is manic, wired and uptight.
sentences.cn: 今晚，他躁动不安，紧张兮兮的。

sentences.en: Under these conditions, the more manic - depressive his behavior, the better for you.
sentences.cn: 所以在这种情况下, 他的行为举止越失措, 你可能得到的好处也就越多.
威斯顿发狂似地打完了字.

trans.tran_cn: <医>躁狂的，患躁狂病的，疯狂的
trans.tran_en: relating to a feeling of great happiness or excitement that is part of a mental illness
